CustomField.formula: CASE(StageName, "Opportunity Identified", "6) Pipeline - Opportunity Identified", "Proposal Submitted", "5) Pipeline - Proposal Submitted", "Negotiation", "4) Pipeline - Negotiation", "Verbal Commitment", "3) Projected - Verbal Commitment", "Closed Won", "2) Projected - Closed Won", "Closed Won - Reconciled", "1) Contracted - Closed Won Reconciled", "Closed Lost", "8) Omitted - Closed Lost", "Declined", "9) Omitted - Declined", "Prospecting", "7) Omitted - Prospecting", null)
CustomField.label: Forecast Category - Stage
